title: The Solver's Corner
subtitle: Interactive carousel‑driven personal site
fullDescription: Built a one‑page personal portfolio using AI‑powered tools and React. Features four swipeable carousels (Work Experience, Newsletter, Community, Projects), modal detail views with ‘Play’ links, and a looping B‑roll hero video. Deployed for free via v0.dev.
achievements: Seamless Netflix‑style UX with responsive carousels
Dynamic video banner without using a backend

title: Flip The Choice
subtitle: Fun app for making decisions
fullDescription: Generated a choice app for a Choose Your Own Adventure experience on Mother's Day for my wife. Created in 10 minutes with Lovable
achievements: A fun Mother's Day for my wife
A reusable application for decision making

title: WebRTC Quickstream
subtitle: A Node package for streamlining the use of WebRTC in React applications
fullDescription: WebRTC Quickstream is a package to help create a WebRTC Media Stream and attach it to a video element easily. WebRTC Quickstream handles the various checks that need to be done to run getUserMedia on all browsers.
achievements: Seamless integration with WebRTC video capture
